sentences.sContent: Maybe it’s all just a big misunderstanding.
sentences.sCn: 也许这只是一个很大的误会。
“你认为他会回来吗？”“也许会吧。”

sentences.sContent: Maybe they’re right, but maybe not .
sentences.sCn: 也许他们是对的，但也许不是。

sentences.sContent: You have talent, maybe even genius.
sentences.sCn: 你很有才能，甚至可以说有天赋。

sentences.sContent: He said he’d finish the work soon – maybe tomorrow.
sentences.sCn: 他说他很快就会完成那项工作——也许是明天。

trans.tranOther: used to say that something may happen or may be true but you are not certain
